description: Unspecified vulnerability in the CMDB Metadata & Instance APIs component in Oracle Database Server 10.1.0.5, 10.2.0.3, 10.2.0.4, 10.2.0.5, 11.1.0.7, 11.2.0.1, and 11.2.0.2; and Oracle Enterprise Manager Grid Control 10.1.0.6 and 10.2.0.5; allows remote authenticated users to affect confidentiality and integrity via unknown vectors.
